name: Darkness Unmasked
activation: Move one guard to this location.
bust: Take 1 discord for each guard at this location.

name: Underground Party
bust: Remove all asset dice at this location and discard.

name: Background Checks
activation: Search discard for an Imperial Guard. If found, put into play.

name: War Plans
effect: Roll 1 additional skill die to create assets at this location.

name: Secret Society
effect: Roll 1 fewer skill die to create assets at this location.
